glsa.title: HAVP: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A Denial of Service vulnerability has been reported in HAVP.

background.p: HAVP is a HTTP AntiVirus Proxy.

description.p: Peter Warasin reported an infinite loop in sockethandler.cpp when connecting to a non-responsive HTTP server.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send requests to unavailable servers, resulting in a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All HAVP users should upgrade to the latest version:
